Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Agent', 3: 'Are you Commandant of the Gray Ravens?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Agent', 3: "I am Ayla's agent.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Agent', 3: "Of course, that's neither here nor there. Thanks to you, Ayla's been making a fuss about her installation...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Agent', 3: "...I think it'd be best for you to come here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory21.jpg'}
{3: 'Ayla\'s filled her room will sorts of "blocks" yesterday...'}
{3: 'Ayla has been working non-stop carving blocks, and empty cans of energy drinks are all over the place.'}
{2: 'Agent', 3: 'Are you the commandant that solved Ayla\'s "puzzle"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Agent', 3: "The most annoying thing for an artist is unveiling their artwork before it's ready.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Agent', 3: 'If their "puzzle" is solved too early, the artist will have one of two thoughtsâ€”', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Agent', 3: 'Either they will think they are stupid, or that the viewer is too smart.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Agent', 3: 'So, in order to prove that they aren\'t stupid, they become almost... paranoid in their attempt to design a new "puzzle."', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'What are you going on about...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Oh? It's you. What brings you here?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Agent', 3: "Those are the only two possible explanations as to why you've been up all night working.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Agent', 3: 'Whoever did this to you is responsible for fixing it. As for who, all I had to do was look at the system records.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Agent', 3: "...You've really outdone yourself this time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'I just think I can come up with a better puzzle is all.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Agent', 3: "If you want practical feedback, wouldn't it be better to get advice rather than bury yourself in your work?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Agent', 3: '"If you want your voice to be heard, then you have to let others hear it."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Agent', 3: 'By the way, the person in charge of the art exhibition asked me to tell you that your piece will have to until the next exhibition.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Agent', 3: 'But I suggest that you go today...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Agent', 3: "Looking at other artists' works might give you some inspiration.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: '...You only ever seem to make sense at a time like this.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Agent', 3: 'But as your agent, this is all the advice I can give you now.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Agent', 3: 'As for how to frame the "question," that is left to the creator... That\'s what a former member of the WGAA once said.', 4: '2'}
